name: Are You Roady?
description:
Take control of the road and create incredible high-speed stunts

In this easily controllable game, you ARE the race track.
Make the cars fly, roll and crash into each other to eliminate them from the race.

How to control: mouse to move the road to left, right, up and down.
Throw obstacles by clicking on the road.

When a car leaves the road it is eliminated and explodes.
